sentences.english: There are many different ball games that can do this for us.
sentences.chinese: 有很多種不同的球類運動有此效用。

sentences.english: She is fond of ball-games and her whole family are proud of her.
sentences.chinese: 她很喜歡球類運動，她的全家都爲她感到驕傲。

sentences.english: Besides on the Internet we can read books enjoy music and watch ball games.
sentences.chinese: 此外在互聯網上我們可以讀書享受音樂看球類運動。

sentences.english: Match fixtures will give you something to aim for.
sentences.chinese: 球類比賽會使你的鍛鍊有目標性。

sentences.english: He excels at all the ball games and represents the red Olympic ring.
sentences.chinese: 他擅長於所有的球類運動，並且代表了紅色奧運環。

sentences.english: One day,all of the balls in the world gathered together.
sentences.chinese: 一天，世界上所有的球類聚集到了一起。

sentences.english: Ball games have become an integral part of modern society.
sentences.chinese: 球類運動已經成爲當今社會一個重要的組成部分。

sentences.english: Finally, peanuts are not just meant for the ball games.
sentences.chinese: 最後提到花生，其並不僅僅代表球類運動。

sentences.english: Self-check: Tick the ball games you know.
sentences.chinese: 你都知道哪些球類運動呢？請打勾。

sentences.english: I like football, basketball and the other ball games.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡足球，籃球以及其它一些的球類運動。

sentences.english: Team-spirit is a new concept recently popular in the sports where a group of players competes against another.
sentences.chinese: 團隊精神是近年流行在球類運動集體項目中的新概念。

sentences.english: After school, we can spend an hour playing ball games.
sentences.chinese: 放學後，我們可以花一個小時玩球類運動。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the characteristic, prevention and management of the ocular trauma in ball games.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討球類運動性眼外傷的特點及防治措施。

sentences.english: And then there is a series of, the asset of every ball game and across in polo.
sentences.chinese: 還有一系列的，球類運動和馬球的優點。

sentences.english: One day, all of the balls in the world gathered together.
sentences.chinese: 一天，世界上所有的球類聚集到了一起。

definition: to spike the ball (volleyball etc)/to smash (tennis etc)
lit. to draw a gourd from the model (idiom)/fig. to copy sth mechanically without attempt at originality
(jocularly) public building that has been lying idle (and is thus ideal for housing mosquitos) (Tw)
a tax declaration form/a tax return
to enroll in the Communist Youth League
